name: Form Field Modification
description: Modify form field styling, labels, placeholders, and validation. Perfect for form optimization tests.
content:
<script>
(function() {
  var field = document.querySelector('{{SELECTOR}}');
  if (!field) return;
  
  // Inject CSS for form field styling
  var style = document.createElement('style');
  style.textContent = '' +
    '.at-form-field { padding: 12px; border-radius: 4px; border: 2px solid {{BORDER_COLOR}}; font-size: 16px; width: 100%; transition: border-color 0.3s ease; }' +
    '.at-form-field:focus { outline: none; border-color: {{FOCUS_COLOR}}; box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.1); }' +
    '.at-form-label { display: block; margin-bottom: 8px; font-weight: 600; color: {{LABEL_COLOR}}; font-size: 14px; }' +
    '.at-form-helper { display: block; margin-top: 4px; font-size: 12px; color: #6c757d; }' +
    '.at-form-error { display: none; margin-top: 4px; font-size: 12px; color: #dc3545; }' +
    '.at-form-field.error { border-color: #dc3545; }' +
    '.at-form-field.error + .at-form-error { display: block; }' +
    '@media (max-width: 768px) {' +
    '  .at-form-field { padding: 10px; font-size: 14px; }' +
    '}';
  document.head.appendChild(style);
  
  // Apply field modifications
  field.classList.add('at-form-field');
  field.placeholder = '{{PLACEHOLDER}}';
  
  if ('{{LABEL}}' !== '') {
    // Check if label already exists
    var existingLabel = field.previousElementSibling;
    if (!existingLabel || existingLabel.tagName !== 'LABEL') {
      var label = document.createElement('label');
      label.className = 'at-form-label';
      label.textContent = '{{LABEL}}';
      label.htmlFor = field.id || '';
      field.parentNode.insertBefore(label, field);
    } else {
      existingLabel.textContent = '{{LABEL}}';
      existingLabel.className = 'at-form-label';
    }
  }
  
  if ('{{HELPER_TEXT}}' !== '') {
    var helper = document.createElement('span');
    helper.className = 'at-form-helper';
    helper.textContent = '{{HELPER_TEXT}}';
    field.parentNode.insertBefore(helper, field.nextSibling);
  }
  
  // Add validation if enabled
  var enableValidation = {{ENABLE_VALIDATION}};
  if (enableValidation) {
    var errorMsg = document.createElement('span');
    errorMsg.className = 'at-form-error';
    errorMsg.textContent = '{{ERROR_MESSAGE}}';
    field.parentNode.insertBefore(errorMsg, field.nextSibling);
    
    field.addEventListener('blur', function() {
      if (field.value.trim() === '') {
        field.classList.add('error');
      } else {
        field.classList.remove('error');
      }
    });
    
    field.addEventListener('input', function() {
      if (field.classList.contains('error') && field.value.trim() !== '') {
        field.classList.remove('error');
      }
    });
  }
})();
</script>

variables.name: {{SELECTOR}}
variables.description: CSS selector for the form field

variables.name: {{HELPER_TEXT}}
variables.description: Helper text below field (leave empty to skip)
variables.example: We'll never share your email with anyone

variables.name: {{ERROR_MESSAGE}}
variables.description: Error message to show if validation fails
